name: The epic adventure of virtual guy and droid 2 in the voice prompt prototype game
name_original: The epic adventure of virtual guy and droid 2 in the voice prompt prototype game
description:
This is a short game prototype for one of my classes. The prompt that was provided was voice, so I am the main person creating the sound effects. There is only 4 things that weren't directly me, 3 of them were soundtracks that were soundtracks and one was a recording of my facilitator hiccupping. Assets were from the GDevelop asset store.

Assets used:

gdevelop. (n.d.). Sci Fi Lab [Asset Pack Sci Fi Lab]. Retrieved March 8, 2023, from https://gdevelop.io/asset-store/free/sci-fi-lab-sci-fi-lab 

‌gdevelop. (n.d.). Pixel Adventure [Asset Pack Pixel Adventure]. Retrieved March 8, 2023, from https://gdevelop.io/asset-store/free/pixel-adventure-pixel-adventure-pack 

Music:

Komiku. (2018, January 22), Bicycle,  Retrieved December 7, 2022, https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_/Komiku_-_Poupis_incredible_adventures__-_12_Bicycle/ 

‌Komiku. (2018, January 22). Fetch Contest, Retrieved March 19, 2023, https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_/Komiku_-_Poupis_incredible_adventures__-_08_Fetch_Contest/   ‌Komiku. (2018, January 22). Space Bicycle, Retrieved March 14, 2023, https://freemusicarchive.org/music/Komiku/Poupis_incredible_adventures_/Komiku_-_Poupis_incredible_adventures__-_25_Space_Bicycle/
